Hi Tod. Do you see this consistently or is it intermittent? I ask because looking at the stack trace I suspect that it is a race condition, and if it is then it is only by chance that we have not seen it on other platforms. If it is a race condition we definitley need to fix this ASAP.
Is this a regression since M6?
I'm not able to start M6 with WPF
Steve, does the WPF implementation handle multiple displays or should we turn that off in help? (I still think this one may be a help bug, but we need to know either way)
